How to use trig identities and cofunction to evaluate trig functions

\begin{array}{l}\n\sin \left(60^{\circ}\right)=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, \cos \left(60^{\circ}\right) \frac{1}{2} \\\n\tan \left(60^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\sin \left(30^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\cos \left(30^{\circ}\right)= \\\n\cot \left(60^{\circ}\right)=\n\end{array}[imath]\sin \left(60^{\circ}\right)=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, \cos \left(60^{\circ}\right) \frac{1}{2} [/imath] [imath]\tan \left(60^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\sin \left(30^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\cos \left(30^{\circ}\right)= [/imath] [imath]\cot \left(60^{\circ}\right)=[/imath]
